App Name: Seek by iNaturalist

Brief: Dive into the natural world with Seek by iNaturalist, an interactive app that turns your smartphone into a digital magnifying glass for exploring and identifying flora and fauna around you. Whether you stumble upon a mysterious mushroom, an intriguing insect, or a vibrant flower, Seek leverages a vast database of wildlife observations to help you learn more about nature's wonders.
